sentences.sContent: Improvement and utilization of waxy wheat were also discussed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Improvement and utilization of waxy wheat were also discussed.
sentences.sCn: 还讨论了糯小麦的改良和利用问题。

sentences.sContent: Its findings provide the scientific foundation for rational utilization of land.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its findings provide the scientific foundation for rational utilization of land.
sentences.sCn: 它的调查结果为合理使用土地提供了科学根据。

sentences.sContent: That's one of the benefits of estimating: Parametric modeling gives us visibility into resource utilization, allowing us to do our jobs more quickly, more efficiently, and more accurately.
sentences.sContent_eng: That's one of the benefits of estimating: Parametric modeling gives us visibility into resource utilization, allowing us to do our jobs more quickly, more efficiently, and more accurately.
sentences.sCn: 这就是评估所带来的好处之一：参量建模为我们提供了对资源利用的可见性，允许我们更加快捷、有效、精确的完成工作。
